page.title: 13Pig Farming
page.content: After the Second World War,government after government have asked farmers to produce more and more food to feed the country.Today in the {European {Community}we have more food than we can use and still over half the world is starving.In our "D"block,Mr.R.Youde owns a pig and poultry farm.Forty years ago pigs had an average of 7.5 pigs per litter ,reared 16 pigs per sow per year and the pigs would take 4.5 kilos of feed to put on 1 kilo of pig meat.Today,pigs average 10.5 pigs per litter,rear 26 or 27 pigs per sow per year and convert under two kilos of feed for one kilo of pig meat. Poultry,40 years ago would lay 200 eggs per bird per year.Today,hens lay 300 eggs per bird per year.So things have changed a lot in 40 years. Surpluses are bad ,but not as bad as famine.
